programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: New stickers, with a picture of a mysterious bandit, have appeared in Toyland. Clockwork Mouse begs Noddy to investigate. He finds himself going head to head with jealous Hoof who wants to prove that Noddy isn't the only investigator in Toyland. Hoof thinks he's solved the case in no time, but Noddy's attention to detail makes him realise the bandit isn't quite what he seems. Following all the clues Noddy realises that there isn't a sticker bandit at all! The stickers are flyers for a new play that Pat-Pat is putting on for all the toys. She is the ‘sticker bandit” – a character in the play! Panic over, everyone settles down to enjoy the show. Well done, Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Primrose has decided to hold a party for Fifi. Everyone is helping get it ready, even Stingo and Slugsy who are in charge of making the cake. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy sets out to make her own book for story time, but everything goes wrong when Raa Raa decides to join her. Can he put things right in time?

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Mayor Sniffington mixed up the dates for the Dogcathalon and it turns out it’s being held today! Panicked, Tag and Scooch rush off to make sure the three race spots are race ready so they can be approved by the Top Dog. / The Dogcathalon Race has officially started! Tag goes into Crew Chief mode, running around to ensure Team Pawston is ready for each part of the race. But with Sam unable to race, he encourages Tag to take his place and win it all for Pawston.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his “friend” Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppy’s surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Harper unknowingly drops her cooking camp application on the way to post office, it’s up to the Dew Drops to get it into that big blue mailbox. / When Cassie accidentally places Lola's beloved, old toy wand in a box marked for a giveaway drive in the park, the Dew Drops must find a way to retrieve the wand before it ends up in the hands of an entirely new family.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: Marcus has a piano recital and unknowingly forgets his lucky penny at home. Now it’s up to the Dew Drops to get the penny across town and back into Marcus’ pocket before showtime. / When Nicholas rolls the hamster ball (with Hammy inside) out into the streets, the Dew Drops must get Hammy back home safely.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When there’s a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruz’s help to perform a dance for Mom’s birthday. Though it’s hard at first, they learn to put their dolphin, unicorn, and narwhal powers together to create something special. / Kelp, Pixie, Ollie, and their friend Leroy try to help Juniper understand her angry feelings.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Scallop is afraid of her first “tuskist” appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelp’s first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: On their first day at Palomino Bluffs, the girls are determined to make a good impression. Cue the beachfront race — and a daring rescue!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: The PALs run into their old rivals the BUDs on the first day of classes, prompting Lucky to run for class rep. Elsewhere, Abigail helps solve a mystery.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: A terrifying ice monster comes from the portal with a grudge against Puss in Boots, but when the sun proves too much for the water based beast, the San Lorenzans help in an unexpected way

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: It's Lord Crispintine's Day, and Toby is set on Cleevil as his Crispintine, but after a gang of imps from the portal teach Toby to be a real “bad boy,” he learns of their true plans

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag becomes jealous when Yip prefers to spend time with puppy-sitter Beans instead of with her. When Tag and Scooch find out what the sneaky duo are up to, they come up with a plan to outsmart them.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.desc: When Gran announces it’s time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she’s got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi’s building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this “Qilin” isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people’s prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi’s prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip and Oh use Slushious as an inter-planetary taxi but Tip takes it too far; Smek becomes homeless and must accept Oh's help.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip gets carried away with Boov-tech and needs Oh's post office pals to save the day; Oh must participate in a ritual dance to become an adult Boov

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Hardcase follows the crew to the desert and goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get his revenge on Turbo. // White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and spirals into a streak of terrible luck and the crew must help him find it before things get any worse.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Revvithelps Ty unlock his ultimate power to rescue all their friends trapped inside a magnetized mountain by D-Structs, Splitter, Blayde and Pounde

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Peabody and Sherman continue to make things right on their journey to stop an unlikely band of outlaws unleashed by the Guapos.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Fleshed Out Wolfie wakes up one morning to every creature's nightmare?he's turned into a human! Messy Business At The Manor When Mosshead has nowhere to go for vacation, Casper invites him to stay at his uncles' house…where he quickly discovers that Mosshead is the world's worst houseguest.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: New stickers, with a picture of a mysterious bandit, have appeared in Toyland. Clockwork Mouse begs Noddy to investigate. He finds himself going head to head with jealous Hoof who wants to prove that Noddy isn't the only investigator in Toyland. Hoof thinks he's solved the case in no time, but Noddy's attention to detail makes him realise the bandit isn't quite what he seems. Following all the clues Noddy realises that there isn't a sticker bandit at all! The stickers are flyers for a new play that Pat-Pat is putting on for all the toys. She is the ‘sticker bandit” – a character in the play! Panic over, everyone settles down to enjoy the show. Well done, Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Primrose has decided to hold a party for Fifi. Everyone is helping get it ready, even Stingo and Slugsy who are in charge of making the cake. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy sets out to make her own book for story time, but everything goes wrong when Raa Raa decides to join her. Can he put things right in time?

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Mayor Sniffington mixed up the dates for the Dogcathalon and it turns out it’s being held today! Panicked, Tag and Scooch rush off to make sure the three race spots are race ready so they can be approved by the Top Dog. / The Dogcathalon Race has officially started! Tag goes into Crew Chief mode, running around to ensure Team Pawston is ready for each part of the race. But with Sam unable to race, he encourages Tag to take his place and win it all for Pawston.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure – climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his “friend” Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppy’s surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Harper unknowingly drops her cooking camp application on the way to post office, it’s up to the Dew Drops to get it into that big blue mailbox. / When Cassie accidentally places Lola's beloved, old toy wand in a box marked for a giveaway drive in the park, the Dew Drops must find a way to retrieve the wand before it ends up in the hands of an entirely new family.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: Marcus has a piano recital and unknowingly forgets his lucky penny at home. Now it’s up to the Dew Drops to get the penny across town and back into Marcus’ pocket before showtime. / When Nicholas rolls the hamster ball (with Hammy inside) out into the streets, the Dew Drops must get Hammy back home safely.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When there’s a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruz’s help to perform a dance for Mom’s birthday. Though it’s hard at first, they learn to put their dolphin, unicorn, and narwhal powers together to create something special. / Kelp, Pixie, Ollie, and their friend Leroy try to help Juniper understand her angry feelings.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Scallop is afraid of her first “tuskist” appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelp’s first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: On their first day at Palomino Bluffs, the girls are determined to make a good impression. Cue the beachfront race — and a daring rescue!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: The PALs run into their old rivals the BUDs on the first day of classes, prompting Lucky to run for class rep. Elsewhere, Abigail helps solve a mystery.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: A terrifying ice monster comes from the portal with a grudge against Puss in Boots, but when the sun proves too much for the water based beast, the San Lorenzans help in an unexpected way

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: It's Lord Crispintine's Day, and Toby is set on Cleevil as his Crispintine, but after a gang of imps from the portal teach Toby to be a real “bad boy,” he learns of their true plans

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag becomes jealous when Yip prefers to spend time with puppy-sitter Beans instead of with her. Determined to win Yip back, Tag enlists the help of Cheddar Biscuit, Gilber, Spike and Frank to try and win him back. / Frank and Beans find out that Tag and Scooch are trying to get into the Doggy Book of World Records and sabotage every attempt. When Tag and Scooch find out what the sneaky duo are up to, they come up with a plan to outsmart them.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to retrieve Mr. Krupp’s locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Gran announces it’s time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she’s got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi’s building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this “Qilin” isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi’s building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this “Qilin” isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Special Forces agent Brenner and her husband stumble upon an illegal drug compound in the woods while hiking. The drug dealers capture them, kill her husband, and leave her for dead. Not only does Brenner escape alive, she is also seething with rage and vows to hunt down all who murdered her husband and take revenge!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Punish Evil
programme.desc: A shipment of newly issued currency is robbed by three armed robbers, prompting Detective Chang to investigate. Following new leads, he successfully takes down one of the robbers. Meanwhile, the other two plot to rob a gold factory amidst the chaos. With meticulous planning, Chang thwarts their scheme and brings them to justice.

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Indonesian famous models Patricia and Chika as they explore the city's hidden gems and vibrant scenes, immersing themselves in amazing contrasts and trendy vibes.

programme.title: RUTE:Toughness Redefined
programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Ride n' Seek: Malaysia (S1)
programme.desc: Jaime goes back in time to explore old war relics in Kelantan. She tries her hand at Wau (kite-flying), songkat and batik-making. She also tours the city of Kota Bahru and eats a giant catfish.

programme.title: Ride n' Seek: Malaysia (S1)
programme.desc: Jaime explores historic Georgetown before heading to Batu Feringghi beaches to taste Assam Laksa. In Ipoh she drives a hybrid 4x4 Rainforest Challenger and heads to Fraser's Hill for a colonial experience.

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)
programme.desc: From a Revolutionary War-era ship hiding under Manhattan to a sprawling Roman villa unearthed in the backyard of a home. The structures uncovered in this episode lead to more questions than answers.

programme.title: Alone (S11)
programme.desc: As the season begins to change, one participant is forced to take on a massive project. Meanwhile, a pack of wolves interrupts the tranquility of the Arctic night and spells trouble for one survivalist.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S3)
programme.desc: A series of unexplained deaths near Chicago in 1982 starts a nationwide panic. The victims are connected by one frightening detail: cyanide-tainted capsules of Extra Strength Tylenol.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: A man with aspirations to writing crime novels ends up the star of his own breakout story when he tries to escape from one of Mississippi's oldest and most notorious prison farms, Parchman Penitentiary.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: King Arthur. England's first pop culture superhero, his exploits have inspired numerous blockbuster movies and television series.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: All over the world, there are places and objects that are thought to be cursed. Many people avoid these things, believing they will bring harm. Others think that curses are nothing but superstition.

programme.title: Time Capsule Malaysia
programme.desc: Time Capsule Malaysia reveals some interesting cultural gifts from America, how our traditional wayang kulit moved to the 'dark side', and a time when we raced on public roads and loved it.

programme.title: Time Capsule Malaysia
programme.desc: In this final episode, host Razif Hashim explores what constituted a good diet in the 1960s, how a once deadly killer no longer threatens Malaysians, and how small people became basketball superstars.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Darrel Miklos is embarking on a mission to solve one of the most intriguing mysteries in history: the disappearance of the Nazi's looted WWII treasure, estimated to be worth billions.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S1)
programme.desc: An elite team investigates the mysteries of the Bermuda Triangle aided by a secret map decades in the making. They attempt to unravel the mystery of why 27 US Navy aviators and crew vanished in 1945.

programme.title: 10 Things You Don't Know About Malaysia
programme.desc: Think you know Malaysia? Think again. Ezra Zaid will take you on a journey to explore and discover the unexpected sides. Uncover twists behind the historical tales, figures and places you thought you knew.

programme.title: Berdugo (Gabriel Lorenzo)
programme.desc: He is an honest and dedicated cop whose life shatters when a drug syndicate frames him up and massacres his family.

programme.title: Hatulan: Bilibid Boys 2
programme.desc: Bilibid Boys are young and daring but lost in a cruel society.

programme.title: Grease Gun Gang
programme.desc: A renewed ex-convict (Robin Padilla) decided to change his friends’ lifestyle after he came out of the jail.

programme.title: Irosin, Pagputok Ng Araw... Babaha ng Dugo
programme.desc: Anthony Alonzo portrays P/Capt. Antonio Dy, Station Commander of Irosin, Sorsogon. Dy is a recipient of the Medal of Valor from Pres. Cory Aquino for defending the municipal hall from armed NPA rebels.

programme.title: Lalakwe
programme.desc: Anna falls in love with and gives her womanhood to womanizer Eric who promises her marriage. Upon her brother’s insistence to meet the man, she realizes then that Eric is married.

programme.title: Tondo, Libingan Ng Mga Siga
programme.desc: Utoy (Paolo Contis) idolizes his friend and benefactor Johnny (Vic Sotto), whom he looks up to as an older brother. Johnny finds employment as a driver and bodyguard for pretty commercial model Jessica (Christine Jacob).

programme.title: Silaw
programme.desc: Six unsuspecting teens are camping on the site of Mt. Lihim ng Aguila when they trip into a missile silo controlled by a discharged ex-general. Will the teens be able to sneak out of the mess alive, or will they be forever trapped?

programme.title: Okey Si Ma'am
programme.desc: Keempee, Donna, Paco and Lander played high school senior students each having their own personal dilemmas. Ms. Sonia (Alice Dixson), with her unorthodox way of teaching became their counselor and friend who brought out the best in her students.

programme.title: Bakit Ikaw Pa Rin?
programme.desc: Paul and Jenny eloped at the tender age of 17 and managed to triumph over their difficulties. Things eventually takes its toll as Paul's sister, Sylvia schemes to separate them.

programme.title: Alabang Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Alabang, an upscale suburb on the South of Manila, was the setting for this wacky tale of boys from the wrong side of the tracks, who easily fall for rich and pretty girls, who lived in Alabang.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Mikee had led a charmed life. Now she was engaged to marry the man who was considered by her rich parents as the most suitable for their daughter. But Mikee wanted more out of life.

programme.title: Minsan May Pangarap
programme.desc: This is the true story of Aldo Guce and his family, and how they stood upand won against bigotry and the American system of justice. Based on a well-publicized case known among Filipinos in the United States.

programme.title: Unang Tibok
programme.desc: Alona (Miya Nolasco) feels suffocated by her mother's overprotectiveness. Deprived of male company, she answers the first guy who counts her. In trying to control her daughter, the more she is losing her now.

programme.desc: The bidders are back and the competition is fiercer than ever! Mo & Ty set their sights on a container from Mexico, but could everything inside be damaged goods? The Israelis pin their hopes on a mysterious wooden crate, and bids go through the roof on a one-of-a-kind open-air container.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 2
programme.desc: Mo and the Israelis partner up on a container from Africa, but will their alliance result in fool's gold? And later, things take a bizarre turn when a bunch of strange items from an odd collector spark an intense bidding war

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. As she becomes a model for an enigmatic artist specializing in expressive human body sketches, Jing Wen accidentally uncovers a shocking truth, plunging her into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.
